basicInfo.name: Aragon
basicInfo.flavor: \"I appointed Aragon as my commander-in-chief, giving him the authority to lead when I'm not around. Nobody objected. It was a great choice.\"\n- Rudy

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Physical Attack plus 60% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - Self
 - Reduces skill cooldowns by 9s.
スキル強化効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Skill Cooldown Reduction of 9s upon using a basic attack.

Skill 2.name: Giganto Mortar
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 110% of Physical Attack plus 130% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 60% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 130% of Physical Attack plus 150% of Defense.
 - Increases Chance: Stun chance becomes 70%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Veteran's Savvy
Passive.desc:
All Enemies
 - Inflicts All Attack Reduction. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Getting attacked by an enemy has a 25% chance of healing HP equal to 40% of the caster's Defense.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Healing: HP Recovery amount becomes 45% of Defense.
超越2段階達成効果
 - All Enemies
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 27% Crit Rate Reduction upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Rudy, Rook, Chancellor, military, honor, command, good soldiers, battle rations, raw foods, training, reading, soldier-like mindset
profile.story: Aragon is a former special forces soldier who has run the gauntlet of all of Terra Kingdom's most dangerous missions. He is recognized for his outstanding command and has risen to the rank of Battalion Commander.

basicInfo.name: Aragon
basicInfo.flavor: Aragon understands that sacrifices must be made in order to win wars. He will sacrifice his men without hesitation to win. And for the sake of his men, he's also willing to sacrifice himself.
